languages.text: {n}Вскоре артефакт врастает в кожу, и по венам растекается блаженство. Мелкие царапины затягиваются, уставшие после боя члены наливаются силой. Вы исполнены сил, и лишь одно вас тревожит — легкое сосущее чувство голода, подстегнутое запахом крови.{/n}

{n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вскоре артефакт врастает в кожу, и по венам растекается блаженство. Мелкие царапины затягиваются, уставшие после боя члены наливаются силой. Вы исполнены сил, и лишь одно вас тревожит — легкое сосущее чувство голода, подстегнутое запахом крови.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The artefact embeds itself in your skin before long, and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is the mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

{n}The artefact embeds itself in your skin before long, and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is the mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

{n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

{n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

{n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

languages.text: {n}造物迅速嵌入你的皮肤之中，你感觉浑身上下充满了至福的感觉。你感觉自己充满了力量，身上小小的划痕自动愈合，疲惫的四肢百骸也变得无比强壮。唯一令你感到困扰的，便是鲜血的味道引起的轻微饥渴感。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}造物迅速嵌入你的皮肤之中，你感觉浑身上下充满了至福的感觉。你感觉自己充满了力量，身上小小的划痕自动愈合，疲惫的四肢百骸也变得无比强壮。唯一令你感到困扰的，便是鲜血的味道引起的轻微饥渴感。{/n}

languages.text: {n}アーティファクトが皮膚に埋まると、至福の念が血管を通して広がる。小さな傷は治り、戦闘に疲れた手足は強くなった。活力がみなぎり、悩みの種と言えば、血の匂いで掻き立てられた渇きで心が少し痛むくらいである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アーティファクトが皮膚に埋まると、至福の念が血管を通して広がる。小さな傷は治り、戦闘に疲れた手足は強くなった。活力がみなぎり、悩みの種と言えば、血の匂いで掻き立てられた渇きで心が少し痛むくらいである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'artefact s'enfonce rapidement dans votre peau et un sentiment de béatitude vous envahit. Vos petites écorchures guérissent, et vos membres fatigués par les combats gagnent en force. Vous débordez d'énergie et la seule chose qui vous dérange est une légère faim attisée par l'odeur du sang.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'artefact s'enfonce rapidement dans votre peau et un sentiment de béatitude vous envahit. Vos petites écorchures guérissent, et vos membres fatigués par les combats gagnent en force. Vous débordez d'énergie et la seule chose qui vous dérange est une légère faim attisée par l'odeur du sang.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El artefacto se incrusta rápidamente en tu piel y experimentas una agradable sensación recorriendo tus venas. Tus pequeñas heridas se sanan y tus extremidades fatigadas por la batalla recuperan su fuerza. Estás llen{mf|o|a} de energía y la única cosa que te preocupa son las leves punzadas de hambre provocadas por el olor a sangre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El artefacto se incrusta rápidamente en tu piel y experimentas una agradable sensación recorriendo tus venas. Tus pequeñas heridas se sanan y tus extremidades fatigadas por la batalla recuperan su fuerza. Estás llen{mf|o|a} de energía y la única cosa que te preocupa son las leves punzadas de hambre provocadas por el olor a sangre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Artefakt lagert sich rasch in deiner Haut ein, und Glückseligkeit breitet sich durch deine Adern aus. Kleine Kratzer verheilen, und deine kampfmüden Gliedmaßen erstarken. Du bist voller Energie, und der einzige Störfaktor ist der leichte Hunger, den der Geruch von Blut erzeugt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The artefact quickly embeds itself in your skin and bliss spreads through your veins. Small scratches heal, and your battle-weary limbs grow strong. You are full of energy, and the only thing bothering you is mild pangs of hunger spurred on by the smell of blood.{/n}

Du bist voller Energie, und der einzige Störfaktor ist der leichte Hunger, den der Geruch von Blut erzeugt.{/n}
